content: this pattern is also available for free on my blog 1 vanilla tea towel is a simple classic that will fit many kitchen styles quick and easy to make yet still interesting due to knitting the towel on a diagonal it s gonna be a treat to make for both beginners and more experienced knitters alike while the pattern was initially designed for worsted / aran weight yarn it also includes instructions that will allow you to knit the towel in different yarn weight so you can use your yarn stash efficiently instructions for an optional hanging loop included this pattern has been tech edited and test knit **sizes** one size - width 35 cm 14 length 43 cm 17 **materials** **yarn ** 165 m 180 yds of paris drops - 100% cotton 75 m 82 yds per 50g or similar worsted / aran weight category 4 - medium yarn sample worked in colorway 17 off-white **needles ** 5 mm us 8 straight or circular needles or to fit gauge **notions ** tapestry needle **gauge** 18 stitches x 28 row in 10x10 cm 4x4 in garter stitch blocked 1 https //whileberry com/blog/vanilla-tea-towel-free-knitting-pattern
